original_text: Now the rest of the deeds of Shallum, and the conspiracy that he made, behold, they are written in the Book of the Chronicles of the Kings of Israel.
korean_text: 살룸의 남은 사적과 그가 반역한 일은 이스라엘 왕 역대지략에 기록되니라

sentences.original_text: Now the rest of the deeds of Shallum,
and the conspiracy that he made,
in the Book of the Chronicles of the Kings of Israel.
